subject: LTC facility to contractual employees.
text: HTdv 7cflv ~THTi wrfeazroT PHONE 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (Tev Wta6 3< THT TAT4) Extn; 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 6 , SECTOR-10 , DWARKA, NEW DELHI-11004S 11041/21/2002-Admn: October 21,2003 POLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE 62/2003) (Decision taken 0n Admn: s File No. .11041/1/2000-Admn:) It is hereby intimated that the benefit of Leave Travel Concession can also be availed by the employees of the Authority engaged on contract basis, on completion of one year of contract, in accordance with the provisions of Central Civil Services (Leave Travel  Concession) Rules 1988, subject to fulfillment of the conditions prescribed therein. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: 9 hO avallau (S. Logadathan) General Manager (Admn:) To All Officers/Staff on contract basis to: PS to Chairman All Members/CGMs/CPDICVO All PDs of PIUs/ICMUs/SPVs Hindi Officer Librarian NHA Copy
